SRFChangelog.Title: Major Update
Changes: -feat(ui): Label SRU Current In Game Player
-fix(general): NaN crash fix, instead of crashing display 0 value
-fix(warfare): Experience doesnt change based on star rating

-fix(ui): disable production efficiency multiplier
since it doesn't works yet
-feat(warfare): Implement Hover/Tooltips Mode (can be used to change enemy unit)
-feat(ui/general): Column Auto Fixed Width every change tab
-feat(ui/topbar): Label SRU Current In Game Player
-feat(ui/loader): Label SRU Current In Game Player
-feat(ui/topbar): Add Timer Enabler/Disabler, to reduce CPU Usage when not use

SRFDescription: Supreme Ruler Ultimate Trainer with lots of option
SRFMandatoryUpdateMessage:
Mandatory update, please resubscribe or download it here
https://ouo.io/QKoXQe
SRFUpdateMessage:
There is new update
You can download it here
https://ouo.io/QKoXQe
SRFHelp:
[Country]
List of domestic/country/diplomatic information, 
such as treasury, gdp/etc

[Resources]
Contain resource stock,
there will be Market Price, Market Production Cost
Output efficiency


[Warfare]
Warfare are consist of 2 types of Editing object,

1. Unit (Selected Unit)
Modifying this value will only change unit stat of the unit u select, upon removal of selection, the unit will not be tracker

2. Unit (Stat of selected Unit [Warfare Editor]), 
Modifying this value will change the unit original stat.

[Warfare: Calculated option]
-Heal - will heal the current selected unit to actual state form.
-Rambo - Unit morale/eff/exp overload.
-GasSupply2x - Unit current fuel/supply multiplied by 2
-GasSupply4x - Unit current fuel/supply multiplied by 4
-Str2x - Unit current strength Multiplied by 2
-Str4x - Unit current strength Multiplied by 4

[Warfare: Persistent]
A List to track godmode unit

[Warfare: Modified]
A List to revert/change global modified unit back to original value

[Special]
Click Day option
- 1 Day Research, Go to research Tab > Select/Hover on queue to complete the selected research
- 1 Day Army, Go to defense production > Building X / X
- 1 Day Build, Go to land tab, select the building you want to complete (this will not affect AI)

[Special: Facilities]
This are not yet implemented, it will contain specific building variables to change (AI Affected), supply level etc.

features.name: DomesticApproval
features.description: Affected by taxation, social investment, declaration of war, domestic markup

features.name: SocialSpendingCultureSubsidy
features.description: Increase DAR & Migration Rates, Decrease Emigration

features.name: SocialSpendingFamilySubsidy
features.description: Increase birth rate, population growth, work well with healthcare

features.name: SocialSpendingLawEnforcement
features.description: Increase DAR, reduce emigration & chances of guerilla/partisan forming whenever territory conquered

features.name: ArmyExperience
features.description: Experience is gained by participation in combat - attacking and being attacked. The number of unit kills accomplished by your units also contributes to their experience. This experience in turn increases the unit's efficiency.

features.name: ArmyMorale
features.description: Both firing on the enemy and destroying them increases morale. Taking enemy fire and losing your units reduces morale. Morale is also effected by salary and maybe by domestic approval.

features.name: UnitYear
features.description: First Year of quantity production line

features.name: UnitFortAttack
features.description: The strength and range of a unit when attacking facilities,complexes and bridges.

features.name: UnitSoftAttack
features.description: The strength and range of a unit when attacking soft targets.(generally any unarmored land unit)

features.name: UnitHardAttack
features.description: The strength and range of a unit when attacking hard targets.(generally any armored land unit)

features.name: UnitCloseAttack
features.description: The strength and range of a unit when attacking submarines. / The attack strength of a unit when in close combat conditions.(generally cities and dense forests)

features.name: UnitCloseAirAttack
features.description: The strength and range of a unit when attacking Low flying air targets.(helicopters, some missiles, and some planes during attack runs)

features.name: UnitMidAirAttack
features.description: The strength and range of a unit when Mid altitude air targets. (most planes)

features.name: UnitHighAirAttack
features.description: The strength and range of a unit when attacking high altitude air targets.(Some missiles and planes)

features.name: UnitSurfaceAttack
features.description: The strength and range of a unit when attacking Surface naval vessels

features.name: UnitDefenseClose
features.description: The defensive strength of a unit in close combat.

features.name: UnitDefenseGround
features.description: The defensive strength of a unit when attacked in a form other than close combat, indirect, or air.

features.name: UnitDefenseAir
features.description: The defensive strength of a unit when attacked from the air.

features.name: UnitDefenseIndirect
features.description: The defensive strength of a unit when attacked with indirect fire.(artillery, some-naval ships,missiles and bombers)

features.name: UnitCrew
features.description: Soldiers per squad or equipment piece.

features.name: UnitWeight
features.description: Weight of Military Goods in metric tonnes of each Squad or Equipment piece

features.name: UnitProfileStealth
features.description: Rating of how visible unit is. Used in conjunction with spotting strength and range.

features.name: UnitSpotting
features.description: Represents the distance that a unit is capable of spotting. Depending on the stealth, terrain and actions of any units with in that range you may not see every unit.

features.name: UnitMoveRange
features.description: This reports the distance that a unit can travel on a full load of fuel.

features.name: UnitFuelCapacity
features.description: Volume in Barrels of petroleum carried by each squad/aircraft/ship/sub.

features.name: UnitSuppliesCapacity
features.description: The ammunition held in a squad.

features.name: UnitAmmoWeight
features.description: Lower values affect combat times (0.1/0 equals to weight/supplies)

features.name: UnitCarrierCapacity
features.description: will change unit to carrier type

Categories.description: 1 day build, missile multiplier, sat com

features.name: TechEffectIndustrializationEffect1
features.displayName: Known TE to change global modifier

features.name: TechEffectIndustrializationEffect2
features.displayName: Known TE to change global modifier
